nodes.text: The Pit Screamers, also known as Screamers, was a swoop gang that participated in the All Worlds Ultimate Swoop Rally around 3626 BBY.

The Pit Screamers were known for inventing new death-defying stunts and swoop biking tricks for many years, and their piloting skills were unmatched in swoop racing. The Pit Screamers were loved by fans across the galaxy.

The Pit Screamers' leader during the All Worlds Ultimate Swoop Rally was Raossk, who drove the gang to greater and more dangerous tricks and his single-minded focus was seen by some as an asset to the gang.
